content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a middle school in Beijing invited Academician Fang Binxing, a Chinese information security expert who created the Chinese Internet firewall, to give a lecture.
During the question-and-answer session of the lecture, a girl asked: What does it mean to build a firewall?
Fang Binxing then answered: Things that do not comply with Chinese laws cannot be brought in casually. He also gave the Winter Olympics as an example.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Today, the official media suddenly criticized "Kong Yiji Literature" and said that young people cannot lower their status to find a job because of their high education, just like Kong Yiji, a character in Lu Xun's works. Currently, this topic has become the number one trending search on Weibo.
However, the comment area has repeatedly overturned. Many young people commented on the Communist Youth League Central WeChat account and Weibo that instead of blaming young people for not being able to lower their status to find a job, it is better to implement the labor law and protect workers' rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Yesterday, a chat record about Baidu's AI Wenxin Yiyan was widely circulated. In the picture, someone said that since GP4-4 showed strong multimodal capabilities, Wenxin had to fight to the death, and called on all Baidu employees to be on duty in the background on the day of the press conference. Once there was a problem with the intelligence, manual work would immediately take over.
During today's Wenxin Yiyan press conference, Baidu plummeted nearly 10%.
